A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a movie\, it is very entertaining. As a STAR WARS movie\, it has to be the worst ever made. Making Luke a disenchanted\, bitter\, old hermit who attempts to kill a young boy\, and with no desire to redeem himself or help Rey. Worse yet\, simultaneously killing off the bad guy (Snoke) and Luke at the same time\, knowing that Carrie is gone. Ugh. The franchise is on very slippery ground. The only thing that could possibly be worse is if JJ Abrams has Rey and Kylo fall in love. That would kill the franchise.
